data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Filippini, Valentina, Galante, Eduardo, Micó, Estefanía (2015): Description of six new species of Anomalini from Costa Rica (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Rutelinae). Zootaxa 3948 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3948.1.2
